Class MyReviewsPage

java.lang.Object
application.MyReviewsPage
public class MyReviewsPage extends Object
This class provides functionality to view all reviews created by the current user. It allows users to see, edit, and delete their own reviews through a JavaFX interface.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Application Team

    Map to store review objects with their corresponding database IDs
    private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Review>
    userReviews
    Observable list of the user's reviews to display in ListView

      Database helper for database operations

      private User currentUser
      The currently logged in user

    • userReviews

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Review> userReviews
      Observable list of the user's reviews to display in ListView

  • Constructor Details

    • MyReviewsPage

      public MyReviewsPage(DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User currentUser)
      Constructor for MyReviewsPage that initializes database connection and loads user reviews.
      Parameters:
      databaseHelper - Database connection helper for database operations
      currentUser - Current logged in user whose reviews will be displayed

  • Method Details

    • loadUserReviews

      private void loadUserReviews()
      Loads all reviews created by the current user from the database. Populates the userReviews observable list and the reviewIDs map.

    • createScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene createScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Creates and returns the scene for the My Reviews page. Sets up the layout with a header, list view of reviews, and action buttons.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage of the application
      Returns:
      Scene containing the My Reviews page layout

    • promptForDeleteConfirmation

      private void promptForDeleteConfirmation(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Review> reviewListView, Review review)
      Prompts the user to confirm deletion of a review and handles the deletion process if confirmed.
      Parameters:
      reviewListView - The ListView to update after deletion
      review - The review to delete

    • promptForUpdatedReview

      private void promptForUpdatedReview(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Review> reviewListView, Review review)
      Prompts the user to update an existing review, validates the input, and updates the review in the database if validation passes.
      Parameters:
      reviewListView - The ListView to refresh after update
      review - The review to update

    • showErrorMessage

      private void showErrorMessage(String title, String content)
      Displays an error message dialog with the specified title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the error message dialog
      content - The content text of the error message dialog

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection. This method is required by the interface but doesn't need to do anything since the DatabaseHelper will be closed by the caller.
